questionCopy: How long has your community been in business?
Is your community privately or corporately owned?
How long have the present owners owned it?
Are the owners local or out of state?
Do you have a safe available for residents' use?
What type of license does your community have?
Do you have an updated license issued by the state of (insert state in which the community is located)?
Does it have an effective date and an expiration date?  May I see it?
Is your community LGBTQ friendly?
How many beds are you licensed for?
Where is your license posted?
When was your last inspection?
Did you receive any violations on your last state inspection?
May I see a copy of your last state inspection?
How long has the Administrator been working at your facility?
Is your Aministrator the owner of the facility?
Is your Administrator licensed?
Do you have an Assistant Administrator?
Do you have Department Heads?
Do you have a Director of Nursing?
How long has your Director of Nursing been working at your facility?
Is the Director of Nursing available on weekends?
Does the Director of Nursing have an assistant?
Do you have a Bookkeeper on staff?
If you do not have a Bookkeeper, who handles the accounting?
Is your Administrative Staff available on the weekends?
Who manages the facility during the weekend?
